mapper.select: select t1.`date` as `date`, sum(t1.view_count) as view_count, sum(t1.vote_count) as vote_count, sum(t1.view_increase) as view_increase, sum(t1.vote_increase) as vote_increase from ebook_snapshot t1 where t1.`date` >= date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day ) group by t1.`date` order by t1.`date` asc;
